main_screen__top_toolbar_search_icon.name: main_screen__top_toolbar_search_icon
main_screen__top_toolbar_search_icon.description: Search icon button in the top toolbar.

main_screen__top_toolbar_search.name: main_screen__top_toolbar_search
main_screen__top_toolbar_search.description: Search input field in the top toolbar.
main_screen__top_toolbar_search.effect: set text to update the search input field, filtering the launcher icons to display only those matching the search term.

main_screen__sort_button.name: main_screen__sort_button
main_screen__sort_button.description: Button to sort items in the main screen.
main_screen__sort_button.effect: tap to navigate to the sorting_dialog, which is a dialog window for sorting items. It includes options for sorting criteria and order, and buttons for Cancel and OK.

main_screen__toggle_app_name_button.name: main_screen__toggle_app_name_button
main_screen__toggle_app_name_button.description: Button to toggle app name visibility in the main screen.
main_screen__toggle_app_name_button.effect: tap to toggle the visibility of the app name in the main screen.
main_screen__toggle_app_name_button.element:
<button alt="Toggle app name visibility" id="14" resource_id="toggle_app_name">
</button>

main_screen__more_options_button.name: main_screen__more_options_button
main_screen__more_options_button.description: Button to open more options in the main screen.
main_screen__more_options_button.effect: tap to navigate to the options_popup, which is a popup window that includes options for changing the column count, accessing settings, and viewing information about the application.

main_screen__launchers_grid.name: main_screen__launchers_grid
main_screen__launchers_grid.description: A grid of launcher icons, each with an image and a label. Contains individual launcher_holder elements.
main_screen__launchers_grid.effect: tap to navigate to the clock_interface, which is a clock application interface that includes a top toolbar with buttons for more apps, settings, and about. Below the toolbar, there is a view pager with a list of timers and a button to add a new timer. There is also a horizontal scrollable tab for selecting different clock-related modes, with the 'Timer' mode currently selected. Each timer entry includes a button for the timer time, a label, and a play/pause icon.

main_screen__launcher_holder.name: main_screen__launcher_holder
main_screen__launcher_holder.description: Individual launcher holder within the launchers_grid. Contains launcher_icon and launcher_label.

main_screen__launcher_icon.name: main_screen__launcher_icon
main_screen__launcher_icon.description: Icon of the launcher presented as a button within the launcher_holder.

main_screen__launcher_label.name: main_screen__launcher_label
main_screen__launcher_label.description: Label of the launcher presented as a button within the launcher_holder.

main_screen__floating_action_button.name: main_screen__floating_action_button
main_screen__floating_action_button.description: Floating action button at the bottom right corner of the main screen.

main_screen__main_layout.name: main_screen__main_layout
main_screen__main_layout.description: The main layout of the main screen, containing all other UI elements.

main_screen__content_layout.name: main_screen__content_layout
main_screen__content_layout.description: The content layout within the main layout, containing the main coordinator layout and top toolbar.

main_screen__action_bar_root.name: main_screen__action_bar_root
main_screen__action_bar_root.description: Root layout for the action bar.

main_screen__content_frame.name: main_screen__content_frame
main_screen__content_frame.description: Frame layout containing the main coordinator layout and top toolbar.

main_screen__main_coordinator.name: main_screen__main_coordinator
main_screen__main_coordinator.description: Coordinator layout containing the main content of the screen.

main_screen__main_menu.name: main_screen__main_menu
main_screen__main_menu.description: Main menu layout containing the top toolbar and other menu items.

main_screen__top_app_bar_layout.name: main_screen__top_app_bar_layout
main_screen__top_app_bar_layout.description: Layout containing the top app bar and toolbar.

main_screen__top_toolbar_holder.name: main_screen__top_toolbar_holder
main_screen__top_toolbar_holder.description: Holder layout for the top toolbar elements.

main_screen__top_toolbar.name: main_screen__top_toolbar
main_screen__top_toolbar.description: Toolbar layout containing the search icon, search input, and other toolbar buttons.

main_screen__toolbar_buttons_layout.name: main_screen__toolbar_buttons_layout
main_screen__toolbar_buttons_layout.description: Layout containing the sort, toggle app name, and more options buttons.

main_screen__main_relative_layout.name: main_screen__main_relative_layout
main_screen__main_relative_layout.description: Relative layout containing the main content and floating action button.

main_screen__coordinator_layout.name: main_screen__coordinator_layout
main_screen__coordinator_layout.description: Coordinator layout containing the launchers grid and floating action button.

main_screen__launchers_holder.name: main_screen__launchers_holder
main_screen__launchers_holder.description: Holder layout for the launchers grid and fast scroller.

main_screen__launchers_fastscroller.name: main_screen__launchers_fastscroller
main_screen__launchers_fastscroller.description: Fast scroller layout for quickly navigating through the launchers grid.

main_screen__track_view.name: main_screen__track_view
main_screen__track_view.description: Track view layout for tracking user interactions.

main_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <viewgroup resource_id="main_coordinator">
      <linearlayout resource_id="main_menu">
       <linearlayout resource_id="top_app_bar_layout">
        <relativelayout resource_id="top_toolbar_holder">
         <imageview resource_id="top_toolbar_search_icon">
         </imageview>
         <input resource_id="top_toolbar_search"/>
         <viewgroup resource_id="top_toolbar">
          <linearlayoutcompat>
           <button resource_id="sort">
           </button>
           <button resource_id="toggle_app_name">
           </button>
           <button>
           </button>
          </linearlayoutcompat>
         </viewgroup>
        </relativelayout>
       </linearlayout>
      </linearlayout>
      <relativelayout resource_id="main_relative_layout">
      </relativelayout>
     </viewgroup>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

sorting_dialog__dialog_title.name: sorting_dialog__dialog_title
sorting_dialog__dialog_title.description: The title of the sorting dialog, indicating the purpose of the dialog.

sorting_dialog__sorting_criteria_radio_g.name: sorting_dialog__sorting_criteria_radio_group
sorting_dialog__sorting_criteria_radio_g.description: A radio group for selecting the sorting criteria. Options include 'Title' and 'Custom'.

sorting_dialog__sorting_order_radio_grou.name: sorting_dialog__sorting_order_radio_group
sorting_dialog__sorting_order_radio_grou.description: A radio group for selecting the sorting order. Options include 'Ascending' and 'Descending'.
sorting_dialog__sorting_order_radio_grou.effect: tap to select 'Descending' as the sorting order within the sorting_order_radio_group.

sorting_dialog__cancel_button.name: sorting_dialog__cancel_button
sorting_dialog__cancel_button.description: A button to cancel the sorting operation and close the dialog.
sorting_dialog__cancel_button.effect: tap to navigate back to the main_screen, which is the main interface of the application. It contains a top toolbar with a search icon, a search input field, and buttons for sorting, toggling app name visibility, and more options. Below the toolbar, there is a main coordinator layout with a grid of launcher icons, each with an image and a label. There is also a floating action button at the bottom right corner.

sorting_dialog__ok_button.name: sorting_dialog__ok_button
sorting_dialog__ok_button.description: A button to confirm the sorting operation and apply the selected criteria and order.
sorting_dialog__ok_button.effect: tap to confirm the sorting operation and apply the selected criteria and order.

sorting_dialog__sorting_criteria_title.name: sorting_dialog__sorting_criteria_title
sorting_dialog__sorting_criteria_title.description: A checkbox for selecting 'Title' as the sorting criteria within the sorting_criteria_radio_group.

sorting_dialog__sorting_criteria_custom.name: sorting_dialog__sorting_criteria_custom
sorting_dialog__sorting_criteria_custom.description: A checkbox for selecting 'Custom' as the sorting criteria within the sorting_criteria_radio_group.

sorting_dialog__sorting_order_ascending.name: sorting_dialog__sorting_order_ascending
sorting_dialog__sorting_order_ascending.description: A checkbox for selecting 'Ascending' as the sorting order within the sorting_order_radio_group.

sorting_dialog__sorting_order_descending.name: sorting_dialog__sorting_order_descending
sorting_dialog__sorting_order_descending.description: A checkbox for selecting 'Descending' as the sorting order within the sorting_order_radio_group.

options_popup__options_list.name: options_popup__options_list
options_popup__options_list.description: A list of options presented as buttons within a ListView. The options include changing the column count, accessing settings, and viewing information about the application.
options_popup__options_list.effect: tap to navigate to the settings_screen, which is the settings interface containing a toolbar with a back button and a title labeled 'Settings'. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable view with sections for color customization and general settings. The color customization section includes a button labeled 'Customize colors'. The general settings section includes a checkbox labeled 'Close this app at launching a different one', which is currently selected.

options_popup__column_count_button.name: options_popup__column_count_button
options_popup__column_count_button.description: A button to change the column count within the options_list.

options_popup__settings_button.name: options_popup__settings_button
options_popup__settings_button.description: A button to access settings within the options_list.

options_popup__about_button.name: options_popup__about_button
options_popup__about_button.description: A button to view information about the application within the options_list.

column_count_dialog__column_count_option.name: column_count_dialog__column_count_options
column_count_dialog__column_count_option.description: A scrollable list of checkboxes representing different column count options ranging from 1 to 15 columns. One of the options is selected, indicating the current column count setting.
column_count_dialog__column_count_option.effect: tap to select the 3 columns option in the column_count_dialog, which updates the current column count setting.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='dialog_radio_group' and text()='1 column2 columns3 columns4 columns5 columns6 columns7 columns8 columns9 columns10 columns11 columns12 columns13 columns14 columns15 columns']

column_count_dialog.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <linearlayoutcompat resource_id="parentPanel">
      <framelayout resource_id="customPanel">
       <framelayout resource_id="custom">
        <scrollbar resource_id="dialog_radio_holder">
         <radiogroup resource_id="dialog_radio_group">
          <checkbox>
          </checkbox>
         </radiogroup>
        </scrollbar>
       </framelayout>
      </framelayout>
     </linearlayoutcompat>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

settings_screen__back_button.name: settings_screen__back_button
settings_screen__back_button.description: A button in the toolbar used to navigate back to the previous screen.
settings_screen__back_button.effect: tap to navigate back to the main_screen, which contains a top toolbar with a search icon, a search input field, buttons for sorting, toggling app name visibility, and more options. Below the toolbar, there is a main coordinator layout with a grid of launcher icons, each with an image and a label. There is also a floating action button at the bottom right corner.

settings_screen__title.name: settings_screen__title
settings_screen__title.description: The title of the settings screen displayed in the toolbar.

settings_screen__settings_scrollview.name: settings_screen__settings_scrollview
settings_screen__settings_scrollview.description: A scrollable view containing sections for color customization and general settings.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='settings_nested_scrollview' and text()='COLOR CUSTOMIZATIONCustomize colorsGENERALClose this app at launching a different one']

settings_screen__color_customization_sec.name: settings_screen__color_customization_section_label
settings_screen__color_customization_sec.description: Label for the color customization section.

settings_screen__color_customization_opt.name: settings_screen__color_customization_options
settings_screen__color_customization_opt.description: A list of options for color customization, including a button to customize colors.

settings_screen__customize_colors_button.name: settings_screen__customize_colors_button
settings_screen__customize_colors_button.description: A button within the color customization section used to navigate to the color customization screen.
settings_screen__customize_colors_button.effect: tap to navigate to the customize_colors_screen, which is the customization interface. It contains a toolbar with a back button and a title labeled 'Customize colors'. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable view with sections for customizing theme, text color, background color, primary color, and app icon color. Each section includes a button for selecting the respective customization option. Additionally, there is a 'Save' button in the toolbar.

settings_screen__color_customization_div.name: settings_screen__color_customization_divider
settings_screen__color_customization_div.description: A divider image separating the color customization section from the general settings section.

settings_screen__general_settings_label.name: settings_screen__general_settings_label
settings_screen__general_settings_label.description: Label for the general settings section.

options: Close this app at launching a different one
settings_screen__general_settings_option.name: settings_screen__general_settings_options
settings_screen__general_settings_option.description: A list of general settings options, including a checkbox for closing the app when launching a different one.
settings_screen__general_settings_option.effect: tap to toggle the checkbox for closing the app when launching a different one.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='settings_close_app_holder' and text()='Close this app at launching a different one']

settings_screen__close_app_checkbox.name: settings_screen__close_app_checkbox
settings_screen__close_app_checkbox.description: A checkbox within the general settings section to close the app when launching a different one. It is currently selected.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='settings_close_app' and text()='Close this app at launching a different one']
settings_screen__close_app_checkbox.element:
<checkbox id="18" resource_id="settings_close_app" status="selected">
 Close this app at launching a different one
</checkbox>

customize_colors_screen__back_button.name: customize_colors_screen__back_button
customize_colors_screen__back_button.description: A button in the toolbar for navigating back to the previous screen.
customize_colors_screen__back_button.effect: tap to navigate back to the settings_screen, which is a settings interface containing a toolbar with a back button and a title labeled 'Settings'. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable view with sections for color customization and general settings.

customize_colors_screen__title.name: customize_colors_screen__title
customize_colors_screen__title.description: The title of the screen, labeled 'Customize colors'.

customize_colors_screen__customization_s.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_scrollview
customize_colors_screen__customization_s.description: A scrollable view containing sections for customizing theme, text color, background color, primary color, and app icon color.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='customization_nested_scrollview' and text()='ThemeDarkText colorBackground colorPrimary colorApp icon color']

customize_colors_screen__customization_h.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_holder
customize_colors_screen__customization_h.description: A holder for various customization sections including theme, text color, background color, primary color, and app icon color.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='customization_holder' and text()='ThemeDarkText colorBackground colorPrimary colorApp icon color']

customize_colors_screen__customization_t.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_theme_holder
customize_colors_screen__customization_t.description: A section for customizing the theme. Contains a label button and a theme selection button.
customize_colors_screen__customization_t.effect: tap to navigate to the warning_dialog, which displays a warning message about app icon customization compatibility with some launchers.

customize_colors_screen__customization_t.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_theme_label
customize_colors_screen__customization_t.description: A button for selecting the theme customization option.

customize_colors_screen__customization_t.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_theme
customize_colors_screen__customization_t.description: A button for selecting the specific theme, currently set to 'Dark'.

customize_colors_screen__customization_t.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_text_color_holder
customize_colors_screen__customization_t.description: A section for customizing the text color. Contains a label button and an image view for the selected color.

customize_colors_screen__customization_t.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_text_color_label
customize_colors_screen__customization_t.description: A button for selecting the text color customization option.

customize_colors_screen__customization_t.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_text_color
customize_colors_screen__customization_t.description: An image view displaying the currently selected text color.

customize_colors_screen__customization_b.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_background_color_holder
customize_colors_screen__customization_b.description: A section for customizing the background color. Contains a label button and an image view for the selected color.

customize_colors_screen__customization_b.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_background_color_label
customize_colors_screen__customization_b.description: A button for selecting the background color customization option.

customize_colors_screen__customization_b.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_background_color
customize_colors_screen__customization_b.description: An image view displaying the currently selected background color.

customize_colors_screen__customization_p.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_primary_color_holder
customize_colors_screen__customization_p.description: A section for customizing the primary color. Contains a label button and an image view for the selected color.

customize_colors_screen__customization_p.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_primary_color_label
customize_colors_screen__customization_p.description: A button for selecting the primary color customization option.

customize_colors_screen__customization_p.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_primary_color
customize_colors_screen__customization_p.description: An image view displaying the currently selected primary color.

customize_colors_screen__customization_a.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_app_icon_color_holder
customize_colors_screen__customization_a.description: A section for customizing the app icon color. Contains a label button and an image view for the selected color.

customize_colors_screen__customization_a.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_app_icon_color_label
customize_colors_screen__customization_a.description: A button for selecting the app icon color customization option.

customize_colors_screen__customization_a.name: customize_colors_screen__customization_app_icon_color
customize_colors_screen__customization_a.description: An image view displaying the currently selected app icon color.

customize_colors_screen__save_button.name: customize_colors_screen__save_button
customize_colors_screen__save_button.description: A button in the toolbar for saving the customization changes.
customize_colors_screen__save_button.effect: tap to save the customization changes and navigate back to the previous screen.

warning_dialog__message_scrollview.name: warning_dialog__message_scrollview
warning_dialog__message_scrollview.description: A scrollable view containing the warning message about app icon customization compatibility with some launchers.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='message_scrollview' and text()='WARNING: Some launchers do not handle app icon cus']

warning_dialog__warning_message.name: warning_dialog__warning_message
warning_dialog__warning_message.description: The warning message displayed within the message_scrollview.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='message' and text()='WARNING: Some launchers do not handle app icon cus']
warning_dialog__warning_message.element: WARNING: Some launchers do not handle app icon cus

warning_dialog__button_panel.name: warning_dialog__button_panel
warning_dialog__button_panel.description: A scrollable view containing the button panel.

warning_dialog__ok_button.name: warning_dialog__ok_button
warning_dialog__ok_button.description: A button labeled 'OK' used to acknowledge the warning message and proceed.
warning_dialog__ok_button.effect: tap to navigate to the theme_selection_dialog, which displays a list of theme options for customization. It contains a scrollable view with a radio group of checkboxes representing different theme options. One of the options is selected, indicating the current theme setting.

theme_selection_dialog__theme_options_li.name: theme_selection_dialog__theme_options_list
theme_selection_dialog__theme_options_li.description: A scrollable list of theme options presented as a radio group. Each option is a checkbox representing a theme choice.
theme_selection_dialog__theme_options_li.effect: tap to navigate to the customize_colors_screen, which is the customization interface containing a toolbar with a back button and a title labeled 'Customize colors'. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable view with sections for customizing theme, text color, background color, primary color, and app icon color. Each section includes a button for selecting the respective customization option. Additionally, there is a 'Save' button in the toolbar.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='dialog_radio_group' and text()='Auto light / darkLightDarkDark redWhiteBlack & WhiteCustom']

theme_selection_dialog.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <linearlayoutcompat resource_id="parentPanel">
      <framelayout resource_id="customPanel">
       <framelayout resource_id="custom">
        <scrollview resource_id="dialog_radio_holder">
         <radiogroup resource_id="dialog_radio_group">
          <checkbox>
          </checkbox>
         </radiogroup>
        </scrollview>
       </framelayout>
      </framelayout>
     </linearlayoutcompat>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

camera_interface__toggle_timer_button.name: camera_interface__toggle_timer_button
camera_interface__toggle_timer_button.description: Button to toggle the timer mode in the camera interface.
camera_interface__toggle_timer_button.element:
<button alt="Toggle the timer mode" id="12" resource_id="toggle_timer">
</button>

camera_interface__change_resolution_butt.name: camera_interface__change_resolution_button
camera_interface__change_resolution_butt.description: Button to change the resolution in the camera interface.

camera_interface__settings_button.name: camera_interface__settings_button
camera_interface__settings_button.description: Button to access the settings in the camera interface.

camera_interface__preview_view.name: camera_interface__preview_view
camera_interface__preview_view.description: View for the camera preview in the camera interface.

camera_interface__camera_mode_tab.name: camera_interface__camera_mode_tab
camera_interface__camera_mode_tab.description: Horizontal scrollable tab for selecting camera modes, with options for 'Video' and 'Photo'.

camera_interface__toggle_camera_button.name: camera_interface__toggle_camera_button
camera_interface__toggle_camera_button.description: Button to toggle between the front and back camera in the camera interface.

camera_interface__shutter_button.name: camera_interface__shutter_button
camera_interface__shutter_button.description: Button to capture a photo or video in the camera interface.

camera_interface__last_photo_video_previ.name: camera_interface__last_photo_video_preview_button
camera_interface__last_photo_video_previ.description: Button to view the last captured media in the camera interface.
camera_interface__last_photo_video_previ.element:
<button alt="View last captured media" id="27" resource_id="last_photo_video_preview">
</button>

camera_interface__video_mode_button.name: camera_interface__video_mode_button
camera_interface__video_mode_button.description: Button to select the 'Video' mode in the camera interface.

camera_interface__photo_mode_button.name: camera_interface__photo_mode_button
camera_interface__photo_mode_button.description: Button to select the 'Photo' mode in the camera interface. The 'Photo' mode is currently selected.

clock_interface__more_apps_button.name: clock_interface__more_apps_button
clock_interface__more_apps_button.description: Button to access more apps from the developers.
clock_interface__more_apps_button.element:
<button alt="More apps from us" id="8" resource_id="more_apps_from_us">
</button>

clock_interface__settings_button.name: clock_interface__settings_button
clock_interface__settings_button.description: Button to access the settings of the clock application.

clock_interface__about_button.name: clock_interface__about_button
clock_interface__about_button.description: Button to access information about the clock application.

clock_interface__timers_list.name: clock_interface__timers_list
clock_interface__timers_list.description: A list of timer entries presented as a Recycler View. Each timer entry includes a button for the timer time, a label, and a play/pause icon.

clock_interface__timer_time_button.name: clock_interface__timer_time_button
clock_interface__timer_time_button.description: Button to display and interact with the timer time within the timers_list.

clock_interface__timer_label.name: clock_interface__timer_label
clock_interface__timer_label.description: Label for the timer within the timers_list.

clock_interface__timer_play_pause_button.name: clock_interface__timer_play_pause_button
clock_interface__timer_play_pause_button.description: Button to play or pause the timer within the timers_list.

clock_interface__add_timer_button.name: clock_interface__add_timer_button
clock_interface__add_timer_button.description: Button to add a new timer.

clock_interface__clock_modes_tabs.name: clock_interface__clock_modes_tabs
clock_interface__clock_modes_tabs.description: A horizontal scrollable tab for selecting different clock-related modes. The available modes are Clock, Alarm, Stopwatch, and Timer.

clock_interface__clock_tab_button.name: clock_interface__clock_tab_button
clock_interface__clock_tab_button.description: Button to select the Clock mode within the clock_modes_tabs.

clock_interface__alarm_tab_button.name: clock_interface__alarm_tab_button
clock_interface__alarm_tab_button.description: Button to select the Alarm mode within the clock_modes_tabs.

clock_interface__stopwatch_tab_button.name: clock_interface__stopwatch_tab_button
clock_interface__stopwatch_tab_button.description: Button to select the Stopwatch mode within the clock_modes_tabs.

clock_interface__timer_tab_label.name: clock_interface__timer_tab_label
clock_interface__timer_tab_label.description: Label indicating the Timer mode is currently selected within the clock_modes_tabs.

clock_interface.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <viewgroup resource_id="main_coordinator">
      <viewgroup resource_id="main_toolbar">
       <linearlayoutcompat>
        <button resource_id="more_apps_from_us">
        </button>
        <button resource_id="settings">
        </button>
        <button resource_id="about">
        </button>
       </linearlayoutcompat>
      </viewgroup>
      <relativelayout resource_id="main_holder">
       <scrollbar resource_id="view_pager">
        <viewgroup resource_id="timer_fragment">
         <recyclerview resource_id="timers_list">
          <framelayout resource_id="timer_frame">
           <viewgroup>
            <button resource_id="timer_time">
            </button>
            <textview resource_id="timer_label">
            </textview>
            <imageview resource_id="timer_play_pause">
            </imageview>
           </viewgroup>
          </framelayout>
         </recyclerview>
         <button resource_id="timer_add">
         </button>
        </viewgroup>
       </scrollbar>
       <horizontalscrollview resource_id="main_tabs_holder">
        <linearlayout>
         <linearlayout>
          <linearlayout resource_id="tab_item_holder">
           <imageview resource_id="tab_item_icon">
           </imageview>
           <button resource_id="tab_item_label">
           </button>
          </linearlayout>
         </linearlayout>
        </linearlayout>
       </horizontalscrollview>
      </relativelayout>
     </viewgroup>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>
